  • Processor: 8th-gen core i5 intel cpu or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: i9 9900k intel CPU or amd equivalent

  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 5.1 surround for pure immersion (5.1 surround is not supported for this game)
  • VR Support: wouldn't that be awesome tho
  • Additional Notes: Still requires an internet connection
